name: Plus.Bet
description: BET BIG, WIN BIG, PLUS+ HAVE FUN plus.bet is a fully decentralized on-chain casino on Fantom. Bet directly through your wallet, settled instantly into your address: no middleman, no KYC, no tampering, no bullsh*t. With built in account abstraction, Plus.bet will allow for the ease of web2 and play without gas fees. Bringing some of the most popular games like poker, blackjack, roulette, crash, slots, baccarat, plinko, keno, coinflip, dice and many more!
